summary_points: Company-wide guideline governing all investment activities and personnel.
Absolute restrictions on investing in entities from embargoed jurisdictions (currently Russia and North Korea).
Prohibition specifically covers equity/stock instruments of entities domiciled in embargoed countries.
Mandatory automated pre-trade embargo screening with immediate breach reporting to the CCO.
Compliance aligned with UNSC sanctions, MAS guidance, and applicable local regulations in operating jurisdictions.
Robust compliance framework with pre- and post-trade monitoring, periodic staff training, and independent audits.
All trades logged in a surveillance system; monthly compliance reports submitted to the Board.
Formal escalation: suspected/confirmed breaches → CCO → possible regulator notification; disciplinary actions up to termination.
Guideline reviewed at least annually; amendments require Board approval and prompt communication.
Recordkeeping for approvals, reports, and logs retained for a minimum of seven years; CCO is final interpreter of ambiguities.

actionable_steps.step: Stand up (or validate) an automated embargo-check service in the order management workflow before trade execution.
Publish and maintain a machine-readable embargo list synced to UNSC, MAS, and local regulator updates.
Configure the trade surveillance platform to capture all orders/executions and generate a monthly Board report.

linked_rule.value: Trade surveillance logging and monthly reporting

actionable_steps.step: Define an incident runbook for embargo breaches with immediate notification to the CCO and decision tree for regulatory escalation.

linked_rule.value: Incident runbook with CCO notification and escalation path

actionable_steps.step: Schedule periodic (e.g., quarterly) staff training on sanctions and embargo compliance; record attendance.
Engage an independent auditor annually to review the effectiveness of sanctions controls and surveillance.
Implement pre-trade and post-trade controls (hard blocks, alerts, and attestations) with audit trails.

linked_rule.value: Pre- and post-trade compliance controls with audit trails

actionable_steps.step: Codify a change-management process so any amendments are drafted, approved by the Board, and communicated within 5 business days.

linked_rule.value: Change-management process with Board approval and communication

actionable_steps.step: Enforce a records retention policy of 7 years for approvals, compliance reports, and monitoring logs.
Create dashboards for embargo screening hit rates, false positives, and time-to-escalate KPIs.

linked_rule.value: Dashboards for screening metrics and escalation KPIs
